thread.section_title: Optima Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optima Tax Relief | optimataxrelief.com
thread.title: Kathleen
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Kathleen

author: Kathleen
title: Kathleen
text:
Optima Tax Relief states that one of their core values starts with "Providing excellence for every client, every time. No exceptions. No excuses." OTR definitely exhibited this core value, along with others.
From my beginning consultation with Gabriel, I knew that I had made the right choice in contacting this fine organization of tax professionals. I was grateful for hearing Sean Hannity, Mark Levin, and the late Alan Thicke advertise this fine company. I moved from the initial consultation to working closely with Nereida and Brandon, who never tired of my questions and concerns. Also,Tiena has graciously followed up since we reached a resolution.
I suggest that anyone needing professional help with tax resolution contact this fine organization. You'll be glad you did!
